home.title: Your journey to success starts here
home.description: Whether you're a student dreaming of studying abroad, preparing for university applications, or a young professional seeking direction — I'm here to guide you. With years of experience mentoring students and helping them achieve their dreams, I believe everyone has the potential to succeed. Let me help you unlock yours.
home.hearFromDuongDescription: I believe in practical guidance, not just motivation. Through personalized mentoring, I help you build real skills, craft compelling applications, and develop the confidence to pursue your dreams.
home.testimonialsDescription: Hear from students and young professionals who have transformed their futures with the right guidance and support.
home.faqDescription: Have questions about mentoring, university applications, or career guidance? Find answers here or reach out directly.

footer.description: Helping students and young professionals unlock their potential and achieve their dreams.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Ready to start your journey? Get in touch for personalized mentoring and guidance.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Stories, tips, and insights to help you on your journey to success. From study advice to career guidance, find inspiration for your next step.
blog.emptyDescription: New posts coming soon. Stay tuned for insights and inspiration.
